title.description: The title of the crawled document.

hashed_title.description: The MD5 hash of the title of the crawled document.

raw_text.description: The raw text of the crawled document.

hashed_text.description: The MD5 hash of the raw text of the crawled document.

source_url.description: The source URL of the crawled document.

hashed_url.description: The MD5 hash of the source URL of the crawled document.

discovered_by.description: The type of the crawler that discovered the document.

discovery_timestamp.description: The timestamp of the document discovery.

crawler_type.description: The crawler that discovered the document.

relevance_score.description: The relevance score assigned to the document by the Content Ranking component

highlight.description: A HIGHLIGHT IDENTIFIED by the CTI Extraction component.

vulnerable_configuration.description: A CPE ENTITY dicovered by the Named Entity Recognition functionality of the CTI Extraction component.

cve_entity.description: A CVE ENTITY dicovered by the Named Entity Recognition functionality of the CTI Extraction component.

cwe_entity.description: A CWE ENTITY dicovered by the Named Entity Recognition functionality of the CTI Extraction component.

org_entity.description: An ORGANISATION/COMPANY ENTITY dicovered by the Named Entity Recognition functionality of the CTI Extraction component.

product_entity.description: A PRODUCT ENTITY dicovered by the Named Entity Recognition functionality of the CTI Extraction component.

cvss2_vector_entity.description: A CVSS2 VECTOR dicovered by the Named Entity Recognition functionality of the CTI Extraction component.

cvss3_vector_entity.description: A CVSS3 VECTOR (v3.0-3.1) dicovered by the Named Entity Recognition functionality of the CTI Extraction component.

version_entity.description: A VERSION ENTITY dicovered by the Named Entity Recognition functionality of the CTI Extraction component.

ip_entity.description: A MONEY ENTITY dicovered by the Named Entity Recognition functionality of the CTI Extraction component.

file_entity.description: A FILE ENTITY dicovered by the Named Entity Recognition functionality of the CTI Extraction component.

command_function_config_entity.description: A COMMAND, FUNCTION or CONFIG ENTITY dicovered by the Named Entity Recognition functionality of the CTI Extraction component.

money_entity.description: A MONEY ENTITY dicovered by the Named Entity Recognition functionality of the CTI Extraction component.

date_entity.description: A DATE ENTITY dicovered by the Named Entity Recognition functionality of the CTI Extraction component.

time_entity.description: A TIME ENTITY dicovered by the Named Entity Recognition functionality of the CTI Extraction component.

possible_cpe.description: A possible CPE for a PRODUCT ENTITY.

credit.description: Who reported/found the document such as an organisation, person or nickname.

description: Object that describes CTI gathered from the Crawler component.
name: crawled_obj
